name: Space Craft (Thuklus)
description:
Space Craft is a game where you can create your own space station, mine asteroids for ore, refine it into useful resources, and craft items. You can also sell your resources and items at market and upgrade your station with new modules and technologies. Explore the vastness of space and survive the challenges of building a home among the stars.

It's an early prototype build, expect bugs and missing features.

If you like to support the project, feel free to contact me on Discord:
Thuklus#7204

The plan for now is to deliver one update every week. 

Feedback is very welcome.
